pageContext.description:
The New Inn was new in 1311 when it replaced the old one that burned down. It is believed that the treaty was signed here after the battle of Mortimer's Cross in 1461.

Original watercolour, image size 13.75" x 10".

Mounted to fit frame size 20" x 16".

Price £245

The signed, embossed limited edition print, mounted to fit frame size 14"x 11"

Price £45

pageContext.metaDescription: Watercolour painting of Pembridge, The New Inn, Herefordshire. By Herefordshire artist David J Fry.
